title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Contemporary Haaram
materials: Excellent Cut). Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: A modern interpretation of the traditional Haaram, this necklace features an intricate openwork design studded with brilliant cut diamonds. Pear-shaped emeralds, each surrounded by a halo of diamonds, are gracefully suspended, creating a captivating play of light and color. The flexible chain ensures a comfortable fit.
occasions: or adding a touch of modern elegance to traditional occasions like weddings (పెళ్లి) or receptions. Ideal for a Sangeet or even a special birthday celebration.
description: This contemporary Haaram blends the timeless elegance of emeralds and diamonds with a modern design. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of regional craftsmanship, ensuring a lustrous finish and lasting durability. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds guarantee a dazzling sparkle that will turn heads. It is a statement piece that is both sophisticated and unforgettable.
